workExperience.projectName: China Merchant Securities Co, Ltd – Quantitative Research Internship
workExperience.description: Aggregated and processed 10M+ stock data points from 30+ finance-related datasets using Python. Developed an automated data pipeline with MySQL that increased data querying efficiency by 20%. Designed predictive models for stock dividend forecasts achieving a 76% accuracy rate, encapsulating workflows into modular Python code for reusability. Developed a median-frequency event-driven pipeline for stocks, achieving a 120% annual return on investment.

workExperience.projectName: Tencent Co, Ltd – Data Science Internship
workExperience.description: Designed and implemented a random forest model in Python to classify fraudulent transactions, increasing classification accuracy to 92% and reducing false positives by 25%. Conducted extensive data analysis on 160k+ merchant and 500k+ transaction records; visualized trends and anomalies in Tableau, yielding actionable insights for financial risk management. Performed gap analysis to uncover security loopholes, enhancing system resilience.
Conducted customer segmentation analysis using K-Means and PCA on large datasets. Automated weekly reporting with Python and SQL, and built Tableau dashboards to support marketing strategies.
Provided technical consulting for retail clients, analyzing business data to optimize operations. Designed data-driven solutions and supported client projects with actionable insights.
Assisted in managing the product lifecycle for a mobile app, gathering user feedback, defining requirements, and coordinating development and launch activities.

projectExperience.description: Led a team to analyze customer behavior and sales trends, identified key sales drivers, and proposed optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform.
Developed a personal finance app integrating real-time stock data APIs and budgeting tools, enhancing the UI/UX for better user engagement.

Mined 50+ factors from datasets across 226 countries; trained and evaluated various ML models, achieving a 98.5% accuracy in predicting carbon emissions. Developed an interactive dashboard for an organic food provider, enhancing data management and operational oversight with a 90% adoption rate.

education.description: Relevant coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering Principles.
